definition[1]: used about something that people know about or have discovered
example[0]: a study of all the known facts
example[2]: Apart from vaccines, there is no known way to protect against meningitis.
definition[2]: a known criminal, drug dealer etc is someone who people know to be regularly involved in criminal activities or to do other things that are disapproved of
example[3]: He was found with several other known sex offenders.
